subject: Victoria Secret SwimWear Card
body:

PARTICIPATION & TERMS AND CONDITIONS - Offer valid only to residents of the United States who are at 
least 18 years old. Offer not available to Ohio residents. To claim your reward you must participate in our 
program and meet all of the offer eligibility requirements as outlined in the Terms & Conditions; including age 
and residency requirements; registration with valid email address and shipping address; completion of user survey 
and sponsor promotions. Available sponsor promotions will vary and some offers may require a purchase to qualify. 
See website for complete participation requirements, terms and conditions and offer eligibility requirements. 
Void where prohibited.
To unsubscribe from future ConsumerPromotionsGroup.com promotions and offers please submit an online request 
using the link below. You may also send a written request to: 3250 W. Big Beaver Road, Suite 144, Troy, MI, 48084.

Click here to unsubscribe:http://www.consumerpromotionsgroup.com/advertiser_unsubscribe.php
